:duration.description: The time in milliseconds that should elapse before automatically closing each toast
:duration.description_zh: 自动关闭每个 Toast 之前应经过的时间（以毫秒为单位）

label.description: An author-localized label for each toast Used to help screen reader users associate the interruption with a toast
label.description_zh: 每个 Toast 的作者本地化标签 用于帮助屏幕阅读器用户将中断与 Toast 相关联

swipeDirection.description: The direction of the pointer swipe that should close the toast
swipeDirection.description_zh: 应关闭 Toast 的指针轻扫方向

:swipeThreshold.description: The distance in pixels that the swipe gesture must travel before a close is triggered.
:swipeThreshold.description_zh: 在触发关闭之前，轻扫手势必须行进的距离（以像素为单位）。
